ai-tha-ap348:0.3_0: and he was devoted to Campā.
ai-tha-ap348:2.4_0: the undefiled ones who have crossed the flood.
ai-tha-ap348:3.2_0: I made friends with my head,
ai-tha-ap348:3.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap348:3.4_0: He is the great hermit with the great hermit.
ai-tha-ap348:4.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap348:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap348:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap348:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Campā.
ai-tha-ap348:7.1_0: The sixth section on the most senior monk flowers,
